struct_Diagnostic_13.name: Diagnostic
struct_Diagnostic_13.content:
pub struct Diagnostic {
    pub location: Loc,
    pub error_code: ErrorCode,
    pub message: String,
    pub hint: Option<String>,
    pub filepath: Option<String>,
    pub severity: DiagnosticSeverity,
    pub fix: Option<Fix>,
}

#[derive(Debug, Clone)]

enum_DiagnosticSeverity_24.name: DiagnosticSeverity
enum_DiagnosticSeverity_24.content:
pub enum DiagnosticSeverity {
    Error,
    Warning,
    Info,
    Hint,
    Empty,
}

method_new_33.name: new

method_render_53.name: render
